comment: Thanks for supporting and instilling confidence in me during elections. Always be the fun person you have been since we met the first time in Hyderabad.

comment: Yea my one and only power play valorant duo. It was tooo much fun playing with u for rank up(ofc me carrying you).

comment:
I'll always remember those gaming nights when you'd say "One last one" and then we end up sleeping at 5:00 am.
Keep gaming, growing and giggling. Looking forward to see you at greater hights

comment: Be the same TOM as you are🤞

comment: I really enjoy your cute and funny Hindi conversations, being part of the Raging Wreckers team, our campus walks, and our timepass in the mess. Just a friendly suggestion, maybe tone down the flirting a bit😂. Have fun, keep exploring, and I wish you all the best for your career!
name: Manisha

comment: 4 years classes ki raakunda ela gadipavo teliyadu kaani nee badhakaaniki hats off.. Kaastha tini laavu avvu ra😂

comment: Miss you anna! I am sure that “ ninnu yekkado chustha” with in couple of years🤜🏽🤛🏾, kaluddam hyd lo !!!! And you for sure🥲
